Uses of Interface
com.hazelcast.internal.networking.Networking

  • Packages that use Networking 
    Package Description
    com.hazelcast.internal.diagnostics
    Contains functionality what is happening in a HazelcastInstance.
    com.hazelcast.internal.networking.nio
    Contains the non blocking Networking functionality.
    com.hazelcast.nio.tcp
    Contains functionality for the TCP/IP Networking for cluster members
    This whole package is internal and no compatibility will be provided.

    • Uses of Networking in com.hazelcast.internal.diagnostics

      Constructor and Description

    • Uses of Networking in com.hazelcast.internal.networking.nio

      Classes in com.hazelcast.internal.networking.nio that implement Networking 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NioNetworking
      A non blocking Networking implementation that makes use of Selector to have a limited set of io threads, handle an arbitrary number of connections.
